thesis.title: Approximately Finite Geometries and Their Coordinate Rings
thesis.creator: Alexander, James Howard
thesis.thesis.degree.name: Doctor of Philosophy
thesis.contributor: O. M. Harrold, W. E. Deeds, F. A. Fiskers
thesis.subject: Mathematics
thesis.description.abstract: Introduction: Von Newmann [8]1 has discovered a class of geometries in which the undefined elements are subspaces and the undefined operations are meets and joins of subspaces. His axioms require that the system consisting of the set ? of subspaces together with the two operations form an irreducible, complete, complemented, modular lattice satisfying an additional dual pair of continuity of conditions.
